html:
12.10.23  2:16 am   bill how are you planning to welcome in the upcoming new year?

      what i usually do is enter the number of the finished year in my calculator, then i press "+ 1 =". the answer surprises me every time

12.10.23  2:05 am   thoughts on the word "station" in a lyric?

      it's good

12.10.23  1:11 am   do you look forward to the snow?

      yes. and in turn, during times of snow, i look forward to there being no snow

12.9.23  11:18 pm   what are some good songs with only 1 chord

      it's actually extremely difficult to find a song with actually only 1 chord. It turns out, if you make a song with only 1 chord, going on and on and on and on on that 1 chord, .... the desire gets stronger and stronger and stronger and stronger for it to go to that second chord

12.9.23  11:16 pm   Can you please give me a topic for a song? <3

      how about the process of romantic courtship, from the perspective of 18 to 25 year olds

12.9.23  10:45 pm   Hi bill, How do you pull yourself out of a hat?

      focus on getting into the next hat

12.9.23  10:29 pm   have you ever studied species counterpoint?

     no

      if i wanted to get good at counterpoint where should i start?

     i actually don't even know what the word counterpoint really refers to

12.9.23  10:09 pm   How can you tell when you've missed an opportunity in life?

     for example, if you see a boat go by and you miss it

      Is there a time limit?

     continuing with the example of boats, for a boat in steady motion relative to you, there indeed tends to be a limited range of time during which you can catch that particular boat

     Or something else?

     more boats, for sure

12.9.23  8:51 pm   what video of yours would you consider your most innovative video?

      how to make mistakes

12.9.23  7:57 pm   Can a policeman arrest himself?

      i assume so

12.9.23  7:40 pm   do you like trolleybuses

      almost

12.9.23  7:34 pm   heya hi howdy bill what's a good way to start a question?

      words like 'what' 'how' 'why', are pretty good usually. however, that does not necessarily guarantee that it will be a good question

12.9.23  7:26 pm   what's the best movie about fish?

      i can't think of any movies about fish, but most movies can relate to fish metaphorically. in that case, the best fish movie would be The Godfather

12.9.23  6:48 pm   What is your favourite food?

      chocolate chip cookie

12.9.23  5:38 pm   Is "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes" your go-to answer when you aren't sure how to answer a yes or no question?

      no. i use that for when my first impression is 'no', but then upon further reflection i change my opinion to 'yes'. for this situation, that answer actually fits perfectly. like that warm glove you got for christmas

12.9.23  5:10 pm   how can you get back to earth ?

      there is a simple tutorial in the movie Apollo 13

12.9.23  5:10 pm   Have you ever just winged something?

     sure

      Like you put only half the amount of thought you normally would into something and it just so happened to turn into something great?

     sure

      Or do you put an equal amount of thought into your work?

PS I'm just talking about writing the songs themselves, not the corresponding video if there is one

     i have indeed written songs quickly, sometimes. it usually works out best when it's written quickly, but that's not always possible. however, something about the way you framed the question makes me think you are also referring to the song's production

12.9.23  4:20 pm   if you ever buy a hill, will you name it "hill wurtz"?

      no

12.9.23  3:51 pm   Do you feel alright with the days gone by?

      sort of

12.9.23  1:35 pm   What is your cowbell score?

      perfect

12.9.23  1:24 pm   British or American English?

      check the "R"s. that's how you can usually tell

12.9.23  11:51 am   is the hello sexy pants intro 1 bar of 2/4, then 1 bar of 5/4, then one bar of 3/4, then one bar of 9/4 and then 3 bars of 5/4 or it's just one big bar of 34/4 ?

      it's 8 bars of 4/4, with half a bar pickup before it starts

12.9.23  7:40 am   am i a princess? or a dunce

      princess for sure

12.9.23  6:24 am   Were you in Poland?

      i don't recall

12.9.23  3:17 am   what are your thoughts on rejecting evolution and returning to the australopithecus lifestyle?

      could work maybe as a last resort

12.9.23  3:12 am   are you a question?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.9.23  3:05 am   what is a christmas present you have bought for someone this year?

      i don't celebrate christmas in that particular way. but that doeesn't mean i don't appreciate the sentimental magic of the Q4 earnings period

12.9.23  2:05 am   what kinds of instruments should i use in a 3/4 time signature? normal ones or something else?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but you'll have to try them all

12.9.23  1:50 am   wait you can type your responses in different colors of text instead of just white!?!??!?

      i can do pretty much anything i want, in moderation

12.8.23  10:32 pm   would you ever make a sitcom (situational comedy)?

      no. but i might make something else and call it a sitcom, for good measure

12.8.23  9:43 pm   thoughts on mice? 

      i don't think about mice, but that doesn't mean they're not good

12.8.23  8:33 pm   How do I come up with a question for the questions page?

      impossible. it can't be done

12.8.23  7:12 pm   As a rough estimate, what percent of musicians do you think are self-taught?

      50?

12.8.23  6:54 pm   I've recently become so obsessed with your beautiful music and your sense of humor. I was wondering what is your methodology when it comes to lyrics? I love your lyrics! 

      the secret to the lyrics is music, and the secret to music is lyrics. it's a relationship

12.8.23  5:29 pm   I just teleported 10,000 BC. What do I do?

      first things first, you'll have to get a new calendar. maybe invent one actually

12.8.23  3:24 pm   thoughts on the roman empire?

      iconic

12.8.23  2:54 pm   bill can you answer this question im on my school chromebook

      sure

12.8.23  1:34 pm   Have you ever looked at a sentence and just not been able to understand it. It just doesn't make sense at all no matter how much you re-read it and then you look at it a little later and wonder what you were wondering about

      no, i understand all sentences extremely well

12.8.23  1:29 pm   whats the secret of being a good gambler

      understanding the odds

12.8.23  1:06 pm   why did they change new amsterdam to new york?

      england took it over and named it after an english guy

12.8.23  12:40 pm   Sometimes it feels like there aren't enough words for love. Should I make some new ones?

     sure

     I feel a little bit differently for everyone and everything, so it might take too long. I might have to express what I'm feeling some other way,

     i understand

12.8.23  10:44 am   What wouldn't you not do for nothing?

      indeed, nothing

12.8.23  10:15 am   is there a genre of music you like that might surprise other people

      i've learned not to try to predict what surprises people. i prefer to be surprised by other people being surprised

12.8.23  9:29 am   You ever walk past a vending machine and think "I wann punch that vending machine"?

      no. i feel confident that someone else will do it

12.8.23  9:04 am   do you prefer western dragons or eastern/chinese dragons?

      i don't know anything about dragons

12.8.23  8:14 am   Have your felt tired for being too/so funny?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.8.23  7:58 am    Why is it a good idea to design a pipeline so that the different pipeline stages need approximately the same time to perform their work?

      because it sounds great on paper. that's the only reason i can think of

12.8.23  5:35 am   Bill how do I fix my PC performance

      i'm not sure

12.8.23  4:09 am   do you ever feel like time is slipping away too fast but theres so much you still haven't done in life and ideas you haven't expressed so you're in a constant state of anxiety trying to complete a to-do list that will never end and keeps growing and growing?

     yes

     I feel like that a lot.

12.8.23  3:40 am   Starting to think that the concept of "one" only exists in the mind, and that there is no objectively "single" unit in this reality. "One"
seems like a subjective mental construct. As a consequence math seems like the ultimate fiction that just so happens to be able to best predict our material universe. What do you think?

      that sounds about right
